Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CHILDREN AND FAMILIES

Title: Establishes the statewide childcare workforce living wage fund; appropriation
Summary: Establishes the permanent child care workforce pay equity fund and provides for the distribution thereof; makes an appropriation therefor.
LawCode: Amd ยง97-bbbbb, St Fin L; amd ยง153-k, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law and the state finance law, in relation to creating the statewide childcare workforce living wage fund to improve workforce conditions for employees of childcare services and programs; and making an appropriation for services related to improving workforce conditions for employees of childcare services and programs authorized to receive funding from the statewide childcare workforce living wage fund
